title: Feature Discussions SOP
description: Standard Operating Procedure for conducting feature discussions and posting insights to GitHub issues
purpose: Enable living documentation by capturing development conversations and insights directly in GitHub issues for future reference and team knowledge sharing
scope: All feature-related discussions, design conversations, and strategic insights during development

roles.discussion_facilitator: AI assistant or team lead conducting the discussion
roles.stakeholders: Development team members, product owners, users providing input
roles.documentarian: Person responsible for ensuring insights are captured

trigger_conditions: Substantive discussion about existing GitHub issue topic
Strategic insights emerging from development conversation
User feedback that affects product direction

steps.description: Determine if the conversation contains insights valuable for future reference
Find the appropriate GitHub issue that relates to the discussion topic
Structure the insights in a clear, scannable format with proper context

format.content: User insights, AI analysis, strategic implications
format.footer: ---\n*This discussion happened during active development and represents evolving product thinking.*

steps.description: Add the formatted discussion as a comment to the relevant issue
Verify the comment was posted successfully and is properly formatted

success_criteria: Discussion insights captured in appropriate GitHub issue
Future team members can understand context and decisions

examples.trigger: User recognizes that style guides are actually SOPs
examples.action: Posted insights to ASFE issue #4 about strategic reframing
examples.outcome: Product positioning evolved from 'style guides' to 'SOPs'
